works.description:
I have searched for the following excerpt "In short, you need Microsoft .NET Framework in order to run programs that requires .NET Framework. Just like you need to have Java Runtime installed in order to run Java Programs and you need to have Adobe Flash Player in order to view flash animations" which I have written in my own words to find the following infringing URLs.

This is original work by me and I hold the copyright of the content. After investigating the infringing URLs, the reported URLs have copied my whole post along with images (some even hotlinked).

Kindly take appropriate action.
